title: Random Harvest
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Sidney A. Franklin and Mervyn LeRoy
brief_description: Random Harvest is a romantic masterpiece. Based on the novel by James Hilton (who also wrote “Lost Horizons” and “Goodbye Mr Chips”) this is a story of a man’s loss of, and search for identity and a woman’s undying love and devotion. Consummate film artistry and intelligence make what we see and hear enthralling and moving. Stars Greer Garson and Ronald Colman. Rated: G
